scripts.bump:core: pnpm --filter clases exec npm version patch --no-git-tag-version
scripts.bump:core:minor: pnpm --filter clases exec npm version minor --no-git-tag-version
scripts.bump:core:major: pnpm --filter clases exec npm version major --no-git-tag-version
scripts.publish:core: pnpm --filter clases build && pnpm --filter clases publish --no-git-checks
scripts.bump:tw: pnpm --filter clases-tailwind exec npm version patch --no-git-tag-version
scripts.bump:tw:minor: pnpm --filter clases-tailwind exec npm version minor --no-git-tag-version
scripts.bump:tw:major: pnpm --filter clases-tailwind exec npm version major --no-git-tag-version
scripts.publish:tw: pnpm --filter clases-tailwind build && pnpm --filter clases-tailwind publish --no-git-checks
